body_html:
If you clone master, you should be able to build the java library with --config=mkl and it should just work with the latest changes.
At the moment, this is only on linux, but macOS support is pending a few bugfixes on bazel.
body_text:
If you clone master, you should be able to build the java library with --config=mkl and it should just work  with the latest changes.
At the moment, this is only on linux, but macOS support is pending a few bugfixes on bazel.
body:
If you clone master, you should be able to build the java library with `--config=mkl` and it should just work  with the latest changes.
At the moment, this is only on linux, but macOS support is pending a few bugfixes on bazel.
